headers.value: default-src 'self' https://*.vercel.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.vercel.app https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://www.gstatic.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://*.firebase.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' data: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://*.vercel.app https://*.firebasedatabase.app https://*.googleapis.com https://*.google.com wss://*.firebasedatabase.app https://firebaseinstallations.googleapis.com https://firebase.googleapis.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://www.google.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
